SEARCH
Package hms.boundary.administrator.InventoryManagement

Class AddMedicineView

java.lang.Object
hms.boundary.View
hms.boundary.administrator.InventoryManagement.AddMedicineView
public class AddMedicineView extends View
The view class for adding medicine to the inventory. It provides prompts to the user for selecting a medicine, specifying the amount to be added, and confirming successful addition of medicine to the inventory.

  • Method Details

    • displayHeader

      public void displayHeader()
      Displays the header for the "Add Medicine" section.
      Specified by:
      displayHeader in class View

    • MedicineIndexPrompt

      public int MedicineIndexPrompt(List<String> medicineNames)
      Prompts the user to enter the index of the medicine to be added to the inventory. It ensures the index is within a valid range based on the list of available medicine names.
      Parameters:
      medicineNames - The list of available medicine names for selection.
      Returns:
      The index of the selected medicine, or -1 if there is an error in input.

    • MedicineAmountPrompt

      public int MedicineAmountPrompt()
      Prompts the user to enter the amount of medicine to be added to the inventory. Ensures the entered value is within a valid range.
      Returns:
      The amount of medicine to be added, or -1 if there is an error in input.

    • SuccessfulRequestPrompt

      public void SuccessfulRequestPrompt()
      Displays a message indicating that the medicine has been successfully added to the inventory.
